titleStmt.title: A briefe relation of that which hath been lately attempted to procure ecclesiastical peace amongst Protestants published by Samuel Hartlib.
titleStmt.author: Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.
Dury, John, 1596-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.R. for Andrew Crooke,

notesStmt.note: An account of John Dury's mission to various countries to promote unity of Protestant churches.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
